subject: Automobiles
lead_paragraph: Drag racing works a little differently from other motor sports. Drivers are seeded over four qualifying runs, and then the top 16 drivers compete in a single-elimination tournament, two drivers at a time, on a quarter-mile drag strip.
snippet: Drag racing works a little differently from other motor sports. Drivers are seeded over four qualifying runs, and then the top 16 drivers compete in a single-elimination tournament, two drivers at a time, on a quarter-mile drag strip.
